LanguageData.DMS_CombatRation.label: C-Ration
LanguageData.DMS_CombatRation.description: A block high energy organic polymer ration, invented during World War III as a nutritional supplement for reinforced human troops during combat. For soldiers equipped with nutritional interfaces, it can provide just enough calories for internal organs to function for a long while. But for normal humans, it might cause some slight gastrointestinal discomfort.
LanguageData.Neuroglue.label: Neuroglue
LanguageData.Neuroglue.description:
A protein-like receptor gel which mediates both biological tissues and neural machinery, in order to effectively block phantom limb syndrome and synthetic rejection. It also blocks nanomechanical infections.
Such products have been circulating Rimworld and Midworld planets for many decades, but any organization claiming to have produced this product has been sanctioned by agents from the Coreworlds. They declare that such a product will increase the level of bionic-enhanced pirates which isn't safe for the dire regional balance of security.
